title: SENIORS!!!! LOW INCOME APARTMENTS AVAILABLE
posting_body: ['ROBERT HOLMES MANOR IS NOW ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS FOR STUDIO AND ONE BEDROOM APARTMENTS!!!', 'RENTAL ASSISTANCE AVAILABLE FOR AGES 62 YEARS AND OLDER!!!', 'CALL TODAY!!!', 'show contact info', 'Enjoy the comfort and serenity offered at Robert Holmes Manor 5100 Brush St. Detroit, MI 48202.', "Robert Holmes Manor is located in Detroit's Midtown with access to many hidden treasures in the city.", 'Designated for Senior Citizens aged 62 years and older.', 'Robert Holmes Manor offers clean and affordable suites, with a variety of amenities that add comfort and security.', 'Amenities Include:', '* Paid Utilities', '* Frost-Free Refrigerator', '* Electric Stove', '* Window Treatment', '* Carpeting', '* Laundry Facilities', '* Community Room', '* Library', '* Mail Room', '* Resident Parking', '*On-site Parking', '* Security Patrol', '***Rental Assistance available for those who qualify***', 'Robert Holmes Manor is accessible near most major interstates: I-94 and I-75 and is minutes away from the main campus for Detroit Medical Center.', "Robert Holmes Manor is located in the heart of Detroit's Midtown.", 'Near attractions major attractions, such as:', '* Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History', "* Michigan's Science Center", '* Detroit Institute of Arts', '* Detroit Public Library - Main Campus', '* Detroit Medical Center - Main Campus', '* LCA Arena', '* Comerica Park', '* Fox Theatre', '* Eastern Market', 'For inquiries or to apply, please contact us!!!', 'Applications are available anytime!!!', 'Call or email for an appointment!!!', 'Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday', '10:00 am - 4:00 pm (CLOSED WEDNESDAY)', 'show contact info']
